title: GSA: Appraisal and Fair Market Value Justification for 1365 E Hightower Trail, Social Circle, GA (Parcel ID: SC23000000006000)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. § 552, I request all records related to the valuation, appraisal, and price justification for the federal acquisition of the property located at 1365 E Hightower Trail, Social Circle, GA 30025 (historically "PNK Loggins 100"). This property was reportedly purchased in February 2026 for approximately $128,555,500 from PNK S1, LLC.

This purchase has generated significant media coverage online, along with social media whispers of Russian oligarchs being involved. For additional information: https://www.gpb.org/news/2026/02/13/ice-bought-warehouse-in-social-circle-ga-the-city-wishes-it-hadnt

Specifically, I request the following:

Independent Appraisal Reports: Any third-party or internal GSA appraisal reports used to determine the "Fair Market Value" of the property prior to the February 2026 sale.

Price Justification Memorandum: Any "Determination and Findings" (D&F) or internal memoranda justifying the payment of a 400%+ premium over the property’s 2025 local tax assessment.

Market Analysis: Any "Market Rent Study" or "Comparative Sales Analysis" (COMPS) performed by GSA or its contractors (e.g., JLL, CBRE, Binswanger) regarding this specific site.

Brokerage Communications: Records of correspondence between GSA and the seller’s representative, Binswanger, regarding price negotiations and the final "Best and Final Offer" (BAFO).

Vetting of Seller: Any "Know Your Customer" (KYC) or beneficial ownership disclosures required from PNK S1, LLC or its parent, PNK Group, as a condition of the sale.

Fee Waiver & Expedited Processing:
I request a fee waiver as this request involves the expenditure of over $128 million in taxpayer funds for a "non-traditional" facility conversion, a matter of significant public concern and media interest in early 2026.

Thank you for the General Services Administration and the administration's commitment to transparency.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Delaware

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

Provide records sufficient to show the following:

1. For each cluster program, provide the number of seats per program and location of program broken down by LRE category of enrolled students (LRE1, LRE2, LRE3).

2. Unfilled seats in each program.

Provide this data as of September 19, 2022.

It is not identifiable information to indicate the number of open seats in a cluster program, even if the number is less than 10. If CPS chooses to withhold this information, please provide an explanation for the withheld information and why CPS believes it to be identifiable.

This request is made on behalf of The FOIA Bakery. Because this request is in the public interest for Illinois nonprofit The FOIA Bakery’s work to advocate for public education, please waive any fees in accordance with 5 ILCS § 140/6(c). Feel free to contact me with any questions, or if clarification is needed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Miriam Bhimani

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

All documents related to the incident involving Ramond Carmona on 1/31/2026 in or near Ozark, MO.  These should include the AMBER alert request form, notes, and reports related to the case. These should also include communications from out of state law enforcement agencies regarding the case.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael
